bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of tou tong 頭痛 , headache, extending along the course of the major yang conduits resulting from an intrusion of wind cold into the major yang conduits. That is, the pain affects the region from the top to the back of the head, in severe cases it reaches the nape. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 24: 太陽頭痛，必發熱惡寒 , “In the case of major yang headache [patients] will effuse heat and have an aversion to cold”.
